titles.title: No Congressional Vehicle Leases Act
No Congressional Vehicle Leases Act
To prohibit the use of official funds provided for the operations of a House of Congress for long-term vehicle leases, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
No Congressional Vehicle Leases Act
This bill prohibits funds provided for the operations of a chamber of Congress from being used to lease a vehicle for: (1) more than 30 consecutive days, or (2) any period of time at a daily rate exceeding a maximum rate established by regulation.
